CustomField.formula: IF( AND( quote_line_items__c, OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Mois_caution__c, "Dispensé"), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c, "Approuvé") ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Dpt_garantie__c, "Dispensé"), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c, "Approuvé") ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Paiement_en_avance__c, "0%"), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c, "Approuvé") ) ) ), true, false )
CustomField.label: Recalcul ligne de devis
